name: ITP-003b - Sub-Base Construction Road Widening FCR Class 3
template name: ITP-003b - Sub-Base Construction Road Widening FCR Class 3

name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that the most recent copy of the design drawings are used and have been Issued for Construction (IFC).
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Drawings and drawing registers
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Material proposed for import as sub-base material meets the requirements of VR Section 812. Obtain material compliance data from the supplier.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: Mix Design VicRoads Approval
1.3 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: SMP, PMP, EMP, QMP, TMP and SEQ documentation.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: SMP, PMP, EMP, QMP, TMP and SEQ documentation.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
FREQUENCY: Check prior to placing material
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Material should be spread to minimize number of joints. Transverse joints shall be offset from one layer to next by not less than 2 metres.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Check prior to placing material

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Material should be spread to minimise number of joints. Longitudinal joints offset from one layer to next by not less than 150mm Longitudinal joints to be located within 300mm from planned traffic lane lines or within 300 mm of the centre of a traffic lane.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
FREQUENCY: Check prior to placing material
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: A single lot shall be considered a single layer of 4000m2 or one days production in a single layer, whichever is lesser.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Sub-base shall be constructed to a maximum compacted thickness of 200mm and minimum thickness of 4 times the nominal size of the material.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Cl 304.07b Contract Drawing 2022-95 Sheet 02
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No visible deformation or springing in presence of Superintendent's Rep.( Cl 173) Plant to comply with requirements of Cl 173.03.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer / Site Foreman / Superintendent
3.1 - Determine Testing Scale & Initial testing frequency

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Initially test every lot until 3 consecutive lots of like material and/or work have achieved the standards specified in Clauses 304.09. and 304.12. If no failures, Reduced Frequency applies as specified in Table 304.121.
INSPECTION/TEST METHOD: Document Review/ Site Inspection
FREQUENCY: Every Lot, Every second lot (reduced frequency)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Modified Maximum Density Ratio of not less than 97% Class 3 FCR for road pavement as per Contract Drawings SD-D8-1 sheet 5
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off; Test reports
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
